original_query: SELECT MIN(c.Id) FROM comments as c, posts as p, postHistory as ph, votes as v, badges as b, users as u WHERE u.Id = p.OwnerUserId AND u.Id = b.UserId AND p.Id = c.PostId AND p.Id = ph.PostId AND p.Id = v.PostId AND p.PostTypeId=1 AND p.ViewCount<=4159 AND p.CommentCount>=0 AND p.CommentCount<=12 AND ph.PostHistoryTypeId=2 AND v.VoteTypeId=2 AND u.Views<=86 AND u.DownVotes>=0 AND u.DownVotes<=1 AND u.UpVotes<=6
rewritten_query: CREATE VIEW E1 AS SELECT * FROM comments AS comments
CREATE VIEW E2 AS SELECT * FROM posts AS posts WHERE posts.PostTypeId = 1 AND posts.ViewCount <= 4159 AND (CAST(posts.CommentCount AS INTEGER) >= 0 AND CAST(posts.CommentCount AS INTEGER) <= 12)
CREATE VIEW E3 AS SELECT * FROM postHistory AS postHistory WHERE postHistory.PostHistoryTypeId = 2
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E2E3 AS SELECT * FROM E2 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E3 WHERE E2.Id=E3.PostId)
CREATE VIEW E6 AS SELECT * FROM users AS users WHERE users.Views <= 86 AND (CAST(users.DownVotes AS INTEGER) >= 0 AND CAST(users.DownVotes AS INTEGER) <= 1) AND users.UpVotes <= 6
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E2E3E6 AS SELECT * FROM E2E3 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E6 WHERE E2E3.OwnerUserId=E6.Id)
CREATE VIEW E4 AS SELECT * FROM votes AS votes WHERE votes.VoteTypeId = 2
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E2E3E6E4 AS SELECT * FROM E2E3E6 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E4 WHERE E2E3E6.Id=E4.PostId)
CREATE VIEW E5 AS SELECT * FROM badges AS badges
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E2E3E6E4E5 AS SELECT * FROM E2E3E6E4 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E5 WHERE E2E3E6E4.OwnerUserId=E5.UserId)
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E2E3E6E4E5 AS SELECT MIN(Id) AS EXPR$0 FROM E1 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E2E3E6E4E5 WHERE E1.PostId=E2E3E6E4E5.Id)
